testcase.name: Free CRM Create a new contact scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Login Page.........................................passed When title of login page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user provides login credentials username and password..................passed Then user clicks on login button............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user moves to new contact page.........................................passed Then user enters contact details "Tom" and "Peter" and "Manager"............passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
